content.text: Mobu Head was a captain of a pirate crew and was killed by Capone Bege. He is only shown in the anime.

Mobu Head was a middle-aged man with tan-skin, shaggy greenish hair, and a thin beard. His left arm is tattooed with a pirate skull, which can also be seen on his hat and his shoes. He also wears a red vest with a green shirt under it.
Not much is known except for the fact he became captain of his pirate crew, gained a bounty of at least 10,000,000, and got killed by Capone Bege when the mobster was at sea.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Anime — Episode 826, Mobu Head is first seen in his wanted poster.
↑  One Piece Anime — Episode 826, Mobu Head is introduced.
